name: Peeba
headline: Risk-free wholesale for retailers across Southeast Asia
description: Peeba is a one-stop B2B wholesale marketplace that is changing the way retailers across Asia purchase inventory. We’ve streamlined the buying process, making it easier than ever for independent retailers to buy top-selling products from unique brands for their stores.

founders.name: Jacky Lai, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO @ Peeba - Before Peeba, I have ran two companies including an e-commerce business where I led the team to grow to over $40mn USD in annual sales. I graduated from Emory University in Atlanta, Georgia.

generated_description:
Peeba is a fresh entrant in the wholesale landscape, having launched in 2020 with a mission to offer risk-free wholesale solutions for retailers throughout Southeast Asia. It positions itself as a one-stop B2B marketplace that transforms how independent retailers procure inventory. The aim here? To streamline the purchasing process so retailers can easily access top-selling products from unique brands.

Located in the bustling hub of Hong Kong and backed by the esteemed Y Combinator in Batch W23, Peeba has a dedicated team of 30 employees working tirelessly to reshape the retail supply chain. The company's leadership includes Aaron Epstein as a Group Partner, bringing valuable expertise to the table.

In essence, Peeba caters to the evolving needs of retailers, providing them with a simplified platform to discover and purchase new arrivals and featured products without the usual hassles of traditional wholesale dynamics. If you're interested in seeing what they offer, check them out at [Peeba's website](http://peeba.com/). 

To sum it up, Peeba is at the intersection of fintech and retail, aiming to empower retailers with a hassle-free marketplace experience. It’s an exciting time for independent retail in Southeast Asia—thanks to Peeba.
